content: I completely agree with you. hollywood needs to continue to prioritize diversity and representation to ensure that underrepresented groups are given equal access to opportunities and are better represented on screen and behind the scenes. the industry must make a conscious effort to listen to and uplift voices that have been overlooked and underrepresented for too long. as viewers, we can also demand more inclusive and diverse content and continue to support and celebrate underrepresented filmmakers, actors, and storytellers. with the right steps, we can hope for a future in which hollywood truly reflects the diversity of our world.
